name: Avoid undocumented Programs (EGL)
description: This rule searches for all the undocumented programs.
output: This report provides the following information: PROGRAM full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
reference: Standard suggestions based on CAST Quality Model
remediation: Try to always provide documentation for the programs.
